Description: Rim and handle sherd of East Greek grey ware shallow and carinated pottery lekanis; incurving rim; exterior undecorated except for incised band just below rim; light grey fabric with mica inclusions and dark dull grey slip.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.16)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GL.079)
